headline: Teledyne's Momentum Makes Me Comfortable Buying At A Premium
summary: Teledyne Technologies Incorporated Q4 earnings beat: EPS $6.30, revenue +7.3% on defense demand and digital imaging growth. Click for this look at TDY prospects.

headline: TDY Q4 Deep Dive: Defense and Imaging Growth Drive Margin Expansion, Management Highlights Balanced Outlook
summary: Digital imaging and instrumentation provider Teledyne (NYSE:TDY) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.3% year on year to $1.61 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $6.30 per share was 8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: TDY Q4 Deep Dive: Defense and Imaging Growth Drive Margin Expansion, Management Highlights Balanced Outlook

headline: Why Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Is Up 10.5% After Raising 2026 EPS Guidance and Buying Back Shares
summary: Teledyne Technologies reported full-year 2025 results on January 21, 2026, with sales of US$6,115.4 million, net income of US$894.8 million, and GAAP diluted EPS from continuing operations of US$18.88, alongside new 2026 EPS guidance of US$4.45–US$4.59 for Q1 and US$19.76–US$20.22 for the year. Management’s willingness to issue higher full-year earnings guidance soon after completing a US$400 million share repurchase adds weight to the company’s confidence in its operations and capital...
